alert.note: Alert for Kent; New Castle (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 16 at 8:02PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern New Castle, northwestern Kent, northeastern Queen Anne`s and northern Kent Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 802 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Betterton, or near Aberdeen Proving Ground, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Middletown, Smyrna, Clayton, Millington, Betterton, Hartly, Sassafras, Green Spring, Newtown, Morgnec, Delaney Corner, Massey, Crumpton, Kennedyville, Townsend, Galena, Odessa, Kenton and Chambersville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
